name: sport-ball
effect:
Used by a trainer in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon.

    The wild Pokémon's catch rate is 1.5× normal.
short_effect: Tries to catch a Pokémon in the Bug-Catching contest in National Park. (Gen II: Park Ball)
